visualization_prompt: Generate a dynamic line chart showing synthetic metric fluctuations using interactive data appending

subtitle.text: Click button to append randomized performance data

visualization_explanation: The visualization implements a line chart with synthetic operational metrics demonstrating two key statistical properties: 1) Initial data (μ=85, σ=4.24) establishes baseline performance, 2) Randomized appending maintains domain-appropriate ranges (75-95). Temporal progression uses quarterly intervals with categorical labels for clear period referencing. Color choices follow Cairo's preattentive processing principles using high-contrast #e74c3c for the data line against a #f8f9fa background. The implementation adheres to Tufte's data-ink ratio by eliminating gridlines and using minimal tick marks. Interactive elements follow W3C accessibility guidelines with programmatic announcement of new data points. The dynamic data model simulates real-world system metrics with constrained variability (CV=5%) appropriate for operational dashboards.
